meanings.meaning_en_US: To search for and pursue animals for food or sport.

examples.sentence: They often go [hunting] in the fall.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們通常在秋天去狩獵。

examples.sentence: He loves to [hunt] deer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡狩獵鹿。

examples.sentence: We decided to [hunt] for treasure.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們決定去尋找寶藏。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To present or propose something for someone to accept or reject.

examples.sentence: She decided to [offer] her help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定提供她的幫助

examples.sentence: They [offer] a wide range of products.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們提供各種產品

examples.sentence: He [offer] his opinion during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在會議中提供了他的意見

meanings.meaning_en_US: A place of bliss and happiness in various religious beliefs.

examples.sentence: Many believe that kind souls go to [heaven].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人相信善良的靈魂會上天堂。

examples.sentence: She felt as if she were in [heaven] while on vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她覺得自己在假期時像是身在天堂。

examples.sentence: He described the view from the mountain as [heaven].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他形容從山上看到的景色像是天堂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The perceptible natural movement of the air.

examples.sentence: The [wind] was howling through the trees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風在樹間呼嘯

examples.sentence: She felt the cool [wind] on her face.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她感受到涼爽的風撫過臉龐

examples.sentence: The [wind] changed direction suddenly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風向突然改變了

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is engaged in commercial or industrial business activities.

examples.sentence: The [businessman] made a big deal at the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位商人在會議上達成了一項大交易。

examples.sentence: Successful [businessmen] learn to adapt to new markets.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 成功的商人懂得適應新的市場。

examples.sentence: Every [businessman] should be aware of financial risks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位商人都應該意識到財務風險。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The outer covering of a tree.

examples.sentence: The [bark] of the tree is rough.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這棵樹的樹皮很粗糙。

examples.sentence: We can use [bark] to make mulch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以用樹皮來製作覆蓋物。

examples.sentence: Different trees have different types of [bark].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不同的樹有不同類型的樹皮。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make a short, loud sound; typically said of dogs.

examples.sentence: The dog will [bark] at strangers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 狗會對陌生人吠叫。

examples.sentence: She heard the dog [bark] in the backyard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她聽到狗在後院吠叫。

examples.sentence: He tried to make the dog stop [barking].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試著讓狗停止吠叫。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large fortified building or structure.

examples.sentence: The knight lived in a grand [castle].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 騎士住在一座宏偉的城堡。

examples.sentence: The ancient [castle] overlooks the valley.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座古老的城堡俯瞰著山谷。

examples.sentence: We toured the [castle] during our vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在度假時參觀了城堡。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A state of mental or emotional strain or tension resulting from adverse or demanding circumstances.

examples.sentence: She is experiencing a lot of [stress] at work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在工作中感受到很大的壓力

examples.sentence: Yoga can help reduce [stress].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 瑜珈可以幫助減輕壓力

examples.sentence: He manages [stress] through meditation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他通過冥想來管理壓力

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make an effort to achieve or complete a task.

examples.sentence: She will [attempt] to solve the problem.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將嘗試解決這個問題

examples.sentence: He made an [attempt] to climb the mountain.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他嘗試爬上山

examples.sentence: They plan to [attempt] the challenge again.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們計劃再次嘗試這個挑戰

meanings.meaning_en_US: A conclusion or resolution reached after consideration.

examples.sentence: Making a [decision] can be difficult at times.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 做出決策有時會很困難

examples.sentence: The team's [decision] came after lengthy discussions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊的決策是在長時間的討論後做出的

examples.sentence: She stood by her [decision] even when challenged.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 即使受到挑戰，她也堅持自己的決策

meanings.meaning_en_US: Giving a sense of happy satisfaction or enjoyment.

examples.sentence: The weather was [pleasant] during our picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們野餐時的天氣非常愉快

examples.sentence: She has a [pleasant] smile that brightens the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有一個愉快的微笑，使房間更加明亮

examples.sentence: It was a [pleasant] surprise to see him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 見到他是一個愉快的驚喜

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having previously occupied a particular role or status.

examples.sentence: He is a [former] champion in the tournament.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他曾是這項比賽的冠軍。

examples.sentence: Her [former] job was quite demanding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的前任工作相當具有挑戰性。

examples.sentence: They are [former] colleagues from the same company.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們是同一家公司的前同事。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process of creating, generating, or manufacturing goods and services.

examples.sentence: The factory increased its [production] to meet demand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 工廠提高了生產以滿足需求

examples.sentence: Film [production] involves many stages of development.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電影製作涉及多個發展階段

examples.sentence: The report details the annual [production] outputs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告詳述了年度生產輸出

meanings.meaning_en_US: To comprise or contain as part of a whole.

examples.sentence: The package will [include] a user manual.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個包裹將包括使用手冊。

examples.sentence: Please [include] your contact information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請包括您的聯繫方式。

examples.sentence: The team will [include] members from all departments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個團隊將包括所有部門的成員。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Almost; very close to.

examples.sentence: I have [nearly] finished my work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我幾乎完成了我的工作

examples.sentence: It is [nearly] time for lunch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 幾乎到吃午飯的時間了

examples.sentence: She is [nearly] done with her homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她幾乎完成了作業

meanings.meaning_en_US: Happening or done quickly and unexpectedly.

examples.sentence: The storm brought [sudden] changes in weather.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 暴風雨帶來了天氣的突然變化。

examples.sentence: She felt a [sudden] rush of excitement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她感到一陣突如其來的興奮。

examples.sentence: I heard a [sudden] noise outside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我聽到外面突然傳來的聲音。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small baked unleavened cake, typically crisp, flat, and sweet.

examples.sentence: She offered me a [biscuit] with my tea.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在我的茶旁給我一塊餅乾。

examples.sentence: The [biscuit] crumbled in my hand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 餅乾在我手中碎了。

examples.sentence: These [biscuits] are made with real butter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些餅乾是用真正的奶油製作的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A state of equilibrium or equal distribution of weight.

examples.sentence: He was trying to find his [balance] on the tightrope.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在鋼索上試圖找到自己的平衡。

examples.sentence: Good [balance] is important for many sports.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 良好的平衡對於許多運動非常重要。

examples.sentence: Maintaining a work-life [balance] is essential.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 維持工作與生活的平衡是必需的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To set down in writing or some other permanent form for later reference.

examples.sentence: Please [record] the meeting notes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請記錄會議紀要。

examples.sentence: He wants to [record] a new song.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想錄製一首新歌。

examples.sentence: You should [record] your progress.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該記錄你的進步。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An account of an event or transaction.

examples.sentence: I found the [record] of our last meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我找到了我們上次會議的記錄。

examples.sentence: She broke the world [record] in the marathon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她打破了馬拉松的世界紀錄。

examples.sentence: The medical [record] is confidential.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫療紀錄是保密的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A reward given for excellence or achievement.

examples.sentence: She won a [prize] for her outstanding performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因為她出色的表現，她贏得了獎品

examples.sentence: The scholarship is a highly prestigious [prize].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這獎學金是非常有聲望的獎品

examples.sentence: He was thrilled to receive the [prize] for the best student.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他很高興能獲得最佳學生獎
